Perfect CSS Utility Compainion For Your Projects

PrimeFlex is a lightweight flex based responsive grid optimized for mobile phones, tablets and desktops.

What is PrimeFlex
PrimeFlex is a lightweight flex based responsive grid optimized for mobile phones, tablets and desktops

Key Users
The creator of PrimeNG is PrimeTek Informatics, the distinguished component library vendor who built popular open source projects such as PrimeFaces, PrimeNG and PrimeReact over the past years.
